name: Epicareer International
description: Epicareer is a fast-growing start-up company that aims to deliver products that solve job-finding and recruitment problems using Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology. So we can help to make job-finding and recruitment easier for everyone. We are result-oriented and welcome a fail-fast mentality, ever willing to try out fresh ideas. We encourage a spirit of collaboration, celebrate the success of our colleagues, and practice picking each other up when we inevitably fall. Bureaucracy slows down many companies, so here we built one that practices simple, lean, and efficient processes.
features: we can help to make job-finding and recruitment easier for everyone.
We are result-oriented and welcome a fail-fast mentality
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Find jobs that match with your experience and jobs
ShortDescription: Epicareer is a fast-growing start-up company that aims to deliver products that solve job-finding and recruitment problems using Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology. So we can help to make job-finding and recruitment easier for everyone.
enhanced_description: Epicareer International is a fast-growing start-up leveraging Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology to address both job-finding and recruitment challenges. The company aims to simplify and improve the process for all parties involved, offering solutions designed to help individuals find suitable jobs and organizations efficiently acquire top talent.
key_use_cases: AI-powered job matching for candidates and employers
Reducing the cost associated with hiring qualified employees
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Utilizes Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology for problem-solving
Emphasizes simple, lean, and efficient processes in its operations, potentially translating to product design and user experience
roi_benefits: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
